name: Death Triangle
description:
LORE

The Story of the game revolves around a man who wants to achieve Immortality by giving his soul to the devil and he succeeds in that but at what cost. As he enjoys his Immortality there is also a sad part of it watching his loved one die next to him while he stays young that now he want to live a normal life again.

He is now on the journey of mortality suffering from hardship Going through Forest, Mountains, and deserts. He wants to perform the ritual again but this time will he achieve mortality. 

Description:

A 3D game where death is not the end but rather a key to unlock new stages in the Game. You have to die to move to the next stage.

Defined Tags:

3d Isometric, Puzzle, Horror, Lowpoly
